--- title: Data keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "Utilities for retrieving benchmarks and generating random graphs" ---

Benchmarks¶

cora[source]

cora()

Returns A, X, y where A : is the adjacency matrix X : is the feature matrix y : are the node labels

Synethetic¶

make_planar_graph[source]

make_planar_graph(n)

Makes a planar graph with n nodes

Code adapted from https://stackoverflow.com/questions/26681899/how-to-make-networkx-graph-from-delaunay-preserving-attributes-of-the-input-node

Class versions¶

Following an interface, maybe standard in the future...

class BAGraph[source]

BAGraph(n, m)

class SensorGraph[source]

SensorGraph(n)

KNN sensor graph, this used the github pygsp.graphs.Sensor implementation, not the stable release (i.e. as described in the docs)

class CoraGraph[source]

CoraGraph(save_location='/tmp/cora')
